results.title: Metabolic Syndrome Exacerbates Pulmonary Hypertension due to Left Heart Disease.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ treatment decreased @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammation@@@, @GENE_IL6 @GENE_3569 @@@IL-6@@@ levels, @GENE_STAT3 @GENE_6774 @@@STAT3@@@ activation, and @SPECIES_9606 @@@human@@@ @<m>DISEASE_Arthropathy_progressive_pseudorheumatoid_of_childhood</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C535387 @@@PA@@@ smooth muscle cell proliferation.
